vsParam:
Oh. It seems that everyone is back.
Have you gotten all the materials needed?
Yeah! I got lots of cloth!
I've found some idle furniture... They won't take much space.
Wonderful. Anise and I found many materials for decoration.
Heehee! Here you are, kawaii parts!
Wait a minute! Is this a ball? Will it explode?
Just relax. I've adjusted it. I think it won't explode...
Really... Never mind. I'll trust [px] on that.

Ryza, and everyone, let's happily start our
operation of changing the appearance.
Hehe. Enjoy the happiness it brings!!
Wow! It's perfect. The Academy looks totally different...
What do you think, Ryza? How do you like the new appearance?

I'm... very happy, of course!
It is of great joy to do something different.

And... Heeheehee. I have a very strong sense of
achievement when working with everyone.
I feel that the bond among us gets deeper. Right, Cresson?
Uh, me? Including me? Er, yes!

I still feel that we're on thin ice when it comes to violating
Academy rules... But it's undeniably a joyful experience.
Isn't it just great that you're happy with it, Ryza?
Cresson! Ha ha ha. I did go farther than I imagined...
Yeah? You know it, don't you?
Er. Bergamot Sensei... Why are you so angry?

It's already a compromise to allow you to change
the appearance. What's with the explosive?
Ah! What happened to your head, Sensei? Was it...!
Ah... [px], you said you'd made adjustments~ Ha ha ha.
Ha ha... Should I infuse the Academy rules into your bodies?
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
